abstract: Officials at Lackland Air Force Base, part of Joint Base San Antonio, say deaths of two airmen in apparent murder-suicide does not appear to be linked to any act of terrorism.

headline.print_headline: Two Dead in Shooting at a Base in Texas
headline.main: 2 Dead in Shooting at Lackland Air Force Base in Texas

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

keywords.value: Lackland Air Force Base (San Antonio, Tex)
keywords.name: glocations

snippet: The base in San Antonio was on lockdown after an episode that appeared to be a murder-suicide, the Bexar County Sheriff’s Office said.
lead_paragraph: The base in San Antonio was on lockdown after an episode that appeared to be a murder-suicide, the Bexar County Sheriff’s Office said.
